tool_description: Stay up-to-date with real-time volleyball live scores and highlights, featuring game recaps, post-match interviews, and engaging discussions. Access a diverse range of game odds for an enhanced viewing experience.
name: Volleyball Highlights API
title: Volleyball Highlights API

api_list.name: HighlightsController_getHighlightById
api_list.description: Retrieve highlight details by highlight id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://volleyball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com/highlights/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "volleyball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://volleyball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com/highlights/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "volleyball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url.description: Url location of the video highlight.

code.description: Country code specified by the ISO 3166 standard.

current.description: Home - Away score for the match.

firstSet.description: Home - Away score for the first set.

secondSet.description: Home - Away score for the second set.

thirdSet.description: Home - Away score for the third set.

fourthSet.description: Home - Away score for the fourth set.

fifthSet.description: Home - Away score for the fifth set.

api_list.name: HighlightsController_getHighlights
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all highlights.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: Country code specified by the ISO 3166 standard.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.

api_list.name: MatchesController_getMatches
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all matches. At least one parameter has to be specified.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.

api_list.name: VolleyballOddsController_getOdds
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all odds based on passed query parameters. At least one parameter has to be specified.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.

totalCount.description: Available number of items, relevant to the provided query.

message.description: Explanation message regarding your current tier.
